textBeforeTable: July 1, 2012 Here is The Qwillery's list of books being published in July 2012. If there is something that I've missed, please leave a comment below. Any genre mistakes are mine. Leave a comment below if you feel that the genre is wrong. Also note that this list is always under revision. Publication dates change. I try to keep this as accurate as possible. The most accurate lists can be found for each week in The View From Monday posts. July 2012 Book Releases Friday, June 29, 2012 Share to Pinterest Share to Facebook Share to Twitter BlogThis!
